flows.title: Quick Decision Maker Signup
flows.description: User who already knows what they want and signs up immediately with minimal browsing.
browser_actions: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com and immediately locate the primary call-to-action for sign-up.
Click the prominent 'Get Started' button (or similar clear CTA) on the homepage without deep exploration.
Efficiently fill out the required fields on the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started), such as company name, contact person, and email.
Click 'Submit Application' or 'Continue' to complete the initial signup process.

flows.title: Thorough Product Researcher
flows.description: User who wants to understand the full capabilities and benefits of the fuel card before committing.
user_goals: Decide if it meets their specific trucking needs
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and scan the main sections of the homepage to find product information.
Locate and click the 'Learn More', 'Product', or 'Fuel Card Details' link to navigate to the dedicated product page.
On https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards, meticulously read through all sections including features, benefits, FAQs, and any eligibility criteria.
Scroll down to review any presented testimonials, use cases, or comparison charts.
After gathering sufficient information and deciding to proceed, locate and click the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button on the product page to proceed to signup.

flows.title: Cost-Focused Price Comparer
flows.description: User primarily interested in understanding the pricing structure, fees, and potential savings to compare with competitors.
user_goals: Find pricing, fee, and discount information
Estimate potential savings for their fleet
Compare costs with other fuel card providers
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and immediately look for 'Pricing', 'Fees', 'Savings', or 'Rates' links/sections on the homepage.
Since no direct pricing page exists, click the 'Fuel Card Details' or 'Product' link (leading to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards) hoping to find cost information within it.
On the product page, quickly scan headlines and specific sections for keywords like 'fees', 'pricing', 'discounts', 'rebates', or 'annual cost'.
If specific pricing isn't immediately visible, look for calls-to-action like 'Request a Quote' or 'Calculate Your Savings' to initiate a personalized cost inquiry.
Based on the discovered information (or lack thereof), decide whether to proceed, contact sales, or leave to compare with other providers.

flows.title: Returning Visitor (Application Continuation)
flows.description: User who previously started an application or visited the site and is now returning to complete a task or re-evaluate.
browser_actions: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com, likely via a bookmark, email link, or direct URL entry.
Look for a prominent 'Login' or 'Continue Application' button, or instinctively click 'Get Started' again, expecting to be prompted to log in or retrieve progress.
On the 'Sign up form' page (https://www.atob.com/get-started), locate fields or links to continue an existing application (e.g., 'Already applied? Click here' or enter email to retrieve progress).
If prompted, enter login credentials or the necessary identifier (e.g., application ID, email address) to resume the application process.

flows.title: Mobile User (On-the-Go Enquiry)
flows.description: User accessing the site on a mobile device, likely looking for quick information or to start a basic enquiry while on the road or away from a desktop.
user_goals: Get a quick overview of benefits
See if the service is relevant to their immediate need
browser_actions: Open a mobile browser and navigate to https://www.atob.com.
Quickly scroll down the mobile homepage, scanning for key value propositions and services relevant to trucking fuel cards.
Tap the hamburger menu icon (or similar mobile navigation) to see the available site sections.
Tap 'Product' or 'Fuel Card Details' from the mobile menu to get a concise overview on https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards.
Briefly scroll and skim the product details page, focusing on bullet points, key headlines, and prominent features before closing the browser or deciding to bookmark for later.
